meanings.definition: A person who uses a net.
meanings.sent1: The fisherman caught many fish with his netter.
meanings.sent2: The netter carefully scooped up the butterflies in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The netter at the beach was so skilled, even the seagulls were impressed.
meanings.sent4: She was a true netter, capturing the beauty of nature in her photographs.
meanings.sent5: The little girl pretended to be a netter, trying to catch imaginary creatures in her backyard.

meanings.sent1: This netter fabric is softer than the one we used before.
meanings.sent2: The new fishing net is netter than the old one.
meanings.sent3: The netter material kept the fruits fresher for longer.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a netter, capturing everyone's attention in the room.
meanings.sent5: The netter solution proved to be more effective in filtering out impurities.
